name: SugarGOAT
description:
Welcome experiment #613. You find yourself in a laboratory filled with goats and desserts. Workers at this fishy laboratory are known for sugar-goat-ing rumors about their unorthodox testing procedures.

What procedures, you might ask?

Let's just say there are rumors of two-headed goats, a secret formula for comically sized baked goods, and a warehouse full of genetically modified goats... I'm not brave enough to experience this monstrosity of a facility. But if you think you can stomach the truth, I dare you to play the game.

Programming - nikllamadev

Art - kushion

Music/SFX - free assets taken from ZapSplat.com

This game was made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.
